abstract.p: New York Knickerbockers third-string point guard Rick Brunson fractures left foot during victory over Indiana Pacers in Shaw's Pro Summer League (S)

block.p: Rick Brunson, the Knicks' third-string point guard for the last two seasons, fractured his left foot during the Knicks' 74-66 victory over the Indiana Pacers on Thursday night in the Shaw's Pro Summer League in Boston. He will miss the remainder of the summer league, which ends Monday, but there is no timetable for his return.
The appearance was most likely Brunson's last in a Knicks uniform because the acquisition of Erick Strickland has left the Knicks stacked in the backcourt.
